function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, increased fatalities","Mitigation":"Implementing strict control measures, travel restrictions, and public health interventions","Technologies":"Real-time mobility data, detailed case data analysis","People":"Local and global populations","Owner":"Health authorities, governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Unclear impact of travel restrictions on COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Unpredictable spread of the virus, difficulty in assessing effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Further analysis of mobility data, case data, and intervention outcomes","Technologies":"Data analytics, epidemiological modeling","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Local transmission of COVID-19 cases outside of Wuhan","Impact":"Potential for sustained transmission in other cities, regional epidemics","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance, contact tracing, and targeted control measures","Technologies":"Case data analysis, contact tracing apps","People":"Residents of affected cities, healthcare workers, local authorities","Owner":"Health departments, local governments, community organizations"}]}
